definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: , only ´[[כֶּסֶף חָרוּף בַּע]] [[לָאָרֶץ]] Ps 12:7, usu. (after Targum [[כּוּרָא]]) furnace, crucible (Hup fr. III. [[עלל]]; De al. workshop, fr. I. [[עלל]]) but wholly dub.; NH openly Levy:NHWB iii. 654; Che Du del. as gloss; cf. discussion Che: Expos. T. viii. 236, 336 Ne:ib. 287, 379.
